PasswordPolicyEnforcer.ExceptionInvalidPasswordUppercaseLetterR: The password must contain at least one uppercase character from Latin alphabet. (A-Z)
PasswordPolicyEnforcer.ExceptionInvalidPasswordLowercaseLetterR: The password must contain at least one lowercase character from Latin alphabet. (a-z)
PasswordPolicyEnforcer.ExceptionInvalidPasswordNumberRequired: The password must contain at least one number character. (0-9)
PasswordPolicyEnforcer.ExceptionInvalidPasswordSpecialCharacter: The password must contain at least one symbol. (!@#$%^&*()_+-=[]{}|')
PasswordPolicyEnforcer.PasswordPolicyMinLengthSettingDescriptio: All passwords will MUST be of minimum length specified here. Due security reasons value can not be lower than %1$s.
PasswordPolicyEnforcer.PasswordPolicyOneUppercaseLetterSetting: Require at least one uppercase letter
PasswordPolicyEnforcer.PasswordPolicyOneUppercaseLetterSettingD: Require at least one uppercase character from Latin alphabet. (A-Z)
PasswordPolicyEnforcer.PasswordPolicyOneLowercaseLetterSetting: Require at least one lowercase letter
PasswordPolicyEnforcer.PasswordPolicyOneLowercaseLetterSettingD: Require at least one lowercase character from Latin alphabet. (a-z)
PasswordPolicyEnforcer.PasswordPolicyOneSpecialCharacterSetting: Require at least one non-alphanumeric character
